title: Set Up Equation For the Given Condition
text: Let $$x=calories$$ in $$12$$ ounces of the drink. We can translate into a proportion $$\frac{calories}{ounces}=\frac{calories}{ounces}$$ which gives $$\frac{106}{8}=\frac{x}{12}$$.

title: Solve Equation
text: Solve for $$\frac{106}{8}=\frac{x}{12}$$. What is $$x$$? We can isolate $$x$$ by multiplying $$12$$ both sides. It gives $$x=159$$ as the final answer. Therefore, $$159$$ calories are in $$12$$ ounces of the drink.
